txt.en:
'The estates are back in order, and while there is still much to do within them, that is work we can handle ourselves over time. The Twilight Fields are not yet safe, however. There still remains Ost Heryn.

'Torogethir is charged with watching over this ruined fortress, and while he has been able to do some work to prevent the problems there from growing, he has not had the time nor support to solve them.

'Follow the road east, towards the North Downs. You will find Torogethir on a small hill north of the road above the ruins of Ost Heryn.'
'So, after dealing with every other problem they could find first, they finally send help to me. Better late than never, I suppose.'
'Torogethir has long watched over Ost Heryn. He knows much of its history and secrets.'
Torogethir monitors the pass from the North Downs into Evendim and watches over the fortresses of Fornost and Ost Heryn.
Talk to Torogethir in Parth Aduial

Torogethir's camp is along the road to the North Downs, east of Tinnudir and north of Ost Heryn.\n\nOrchalwÃ« asked you to find Torogethir and help him in his efforts to solve the problems facing Ost Heryn.
